00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename vecType> 
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType perp
00014         (
00015                 vecType const & x, 
00016                 vecType const & Normal
00017         )
00018         {
00019                 return x - proj(x, Normal);
00020         }
